mapper.select: select vm_car_profile.car_profile_id as car_profile_id, vm_car_profile.capacity as capacity, dictionary_project.name as project, dictionary_city.name as city from vm_car_profile, dictionary_project, dictionary_city where vm_car_profile.project_id = dictionary_project.project_id and vm_car_profile.city_id = dictionary_city.city_id and car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
